channel.title: Dspk wtf
channel.description:
Hi. I have DSPK Source and Client. I am running it on a 1GB VPS.
I believe it has memory leak cause it laggs for my players.
Could I use a auto-restarter to fix?
Also, Is there a auto-restarter that will not have rollbacks?
Matt

item.title: Dspk wtf
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

1st, a auto restarter wont fix the problem it will just mask it, if its lagging you need to find the source and fix it.

2nd, auto restarters do not cause rollbacks,

what causes rollbacks is the crappy destruct method most servers use

so instead of using a logout hook or they auto save every 5 mins or so,

so when you restart the server it rolls back to the last time it saved,

use the search bar ik Lin posted a tutorial on logout hooks.

Read full topic
